so instead i just sat around and watched the stars go by, i was there for hours and i dont know why. i was locked up in my room and was all alone, thinking of you but the memories gone.

i thought to myself, eternal youth is just a fading dream, i've lost my spirit and my self esteem. time has taken whats left inside of me, all my emotion and my dignity.

i just cant control these thoughts inside my head man. people promise but it never lasts. i mean my only comfort is the songs i've heard.

nothin matters ot me anymore, years have wasted away and my lifes a bore.

so yes went to the gig last night, watched mendeed and then sat in the bar all night :) ended up chattin for ages to ross and graeme, i hadnt spke to them properly for ages. then me and ross decided to go to the overs after the gig, then joann tells me that natalie was havin a party so i was pure confused as to what to do but in the end decided to go to the catty. she knows why ;)

the gig seemed to finish pure early so we were gonna go to the solid for a few before going to the catty, but then we met sum of ross' friends who were going to underworld so we just went there with them, then they came to the cathouse with us. i actually only spent about a fiver, ross was pure buying me drinks then his friends were too so i was liie..score but then he started buying aftershocks, think he was trying to get me drunk and take advantage of me, haw haw nae chance o that mate :p but aye after a few 'shocks i was pretty steamin and just kinda floated about to see if i knew anyone. spoke to forbes for a while and layla and claire, that was about the only people i knew. danced quite a bit, mainly to hip hop cos ross is a wigga norrat. but the played GLASSJAW, nealry came in ma pants so i did, so i made him dance to that. he didnt seem to amused. i left about 2 cos i was workin 2day which is plain wrong bt then we had to wait about haf a n hour on a taxi then nearly got attacked by a junkie cos ross decided to be cheeky to her, the fool. but luckily we got in a taxi before things got nasty. then i got home and went striaght to bed thinking  theres two chances of me gettin up for work in the mornin, nane and fuck all. but lo and behold i did, feeling like sumthin had cralwed into my stomach and died mind you but hey at least i got up. joann never made tho, shes gettin sacked.....haw j/k btw, but u need to stand up in front of everyone 2moro and explain your absense, i dont make the rules :p

but aye i aint doin fuck all 2nite cos im just not. i mite get a chinky and a video and just chill the fuck out. yes thats what i'll do

im pure mental btw. aye so im heftily bored as per usual. again i have nothin all day. am still in ma pj's :)

just for a wee change, know? i really need to get a fookin job during the week or i fear i mite die.
